entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow mixed with rain beginning overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
